original_text: Then he said to the two men that John had sent, ‘Go back to John. Tell him what you have seen. Tell him what you have heard. Blind people can now see again. People that could not walk can now walk again. People who had a bad disease of the skin are now well again. Deaf people can now hear again. People who had died now live again. Poor people are hearing God's good news.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 너희가 가서 보고 들은 것을 요한에게 알리되 맹인이 보며 못 걷는 사람이 걸으며 나병환자가 깨끗함을 받으며 귀먹은 사람이 들으며 죽은 자가 살아나며 가난한 자에게 복음이 전파된다 하라

sentences.original_text: Then he said to the two men
Tell him what you have seen
Tell him what you have heard
Blind people can now see again
People that could not walk can now walk again
sentences.korean_translation: 걷지 못하던 사람들이 다시 걷게 되었다

sentences.original_text: People who had a bad disease of the skin
Deaf people can now hear again
People who had died now live again
Poor people are hearing God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 사람들이 하나님의 좋은 소식을 듣고 있다
